goals.active: Meet with Eir to discuss an unusual opportunity.
goals.complete: Eir told me about a great opportunity to get even with my most hated rival, Mikkel Toivosson. Whoever makes it to this year's Big Brawl finals gets to fight Mikkel for the championship. Mikkel once humiliated me in a fight. Defeating him is the only way to restore my legend and reputation.

goals.active: Enter the Big Brawl's first round at Edenvar's Homestead.
goals.complete: I was one of two winners in the Big Brawl's qualifying round, a free-for-all open to all norn. Now, we both face a special challenge that decides who moves on to the semifinals. I welcome this test. Each victory brings me closer to a shot at Mikkel.
